instructions: v2.0 This character sheet is usable on its own, but will function better when used with the FotN Companion script and MapChange script. The FotN companion script will reflect changes made to the status effects on to an appropriatly named playmat. On this sheet, the right hand check box will open up a submenu of stats and the left check box will equip the item or ability so that it's stats get added to the 'current' page. Please see the video at https://youtu.be/kabfP442mLQ for a complete demo.
